text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Ngubani owalela ukwambathwa kweempahla azinikwe nguAllâh, Ezivezele izicaka zaKhe, nezinto ezilungileyo ezikukutya?” Yithi, “(ezi) zinto zikobu bomi balo mhlaba ukuba zibe zezabo bakholwayo, zezibe zezabo kuphela ngoMhla woVuko”. Sizichaza kanjalo ke iiVesi zeThu kubantu abanolwazi
